css.name: .clr-col-{1..12}
css.description: For viewport width < 576px an extra small column that can span from 1 to 12 columns wide.

css.name: .clr-col-sm-{1..12}
css.description: For viewport width >= 576px a small column that can span from 1 to 12 columns wide.

css.name: .clr-col-md-{1..12}
css.description: For viewport width >= 768px a medium column that can span from 1 to 12 columns wide.

css.name: .clr-col-lg-{1..12}
css.description: For viewport width >= 992px a large column that can span from 1 to 12 columns wide.

css.name: .clr-col-xl-{1..12}
css.description: For viewport width >= 1200px an extra-large column that can span from 1 to 12 columns wide.

css.name: .clr-row
css.description: A horizontal group of elements that add up to 12 columns.

css.name: .clr-col
css.description: Automatically divides elements into equal width columns. Can be combined with .clr-col-## for automatic re-sizing.

css.name: ..clr-col-{1..12}-auto
css.description: Size the column based on the width of its content.

css.name: .clr-row-break
css.description: Use this after a column to break the following columns onto a new line.

css.name: .clr-offset-{sm, md, lg, xl}-{1..11}
css.description: Combine this with a column class (.clr-col-6) to increase the lolumns left margin by a specific number of columns.

css.name: .clr-align-items-{1..12}-start
css.description: Combine with .clr-row to vertically align columns at the start of the row.

css.name: .clr-align-items-{1..12}-center
css.description: Combine with .clr-row to vertically align columns at the center of the row.

css.name: .clr-align-items-{1..12}-end
css.description: Combine with .clr-row to vertically align columns at the end of the row.

css.name: .clr-align-self-{1..12}-start
css.description: Combine with any .clr-col-* class to vertically align the column at the start of the row.

css.name: .clr-align-self-{1..12}-center
css.description: Combine with any .clr-col-* class to vertically align the column in the center of the row.

css.name: .clr-align-self-{1..12}-end
css.description: Combine with any .clr-col-* class to vertically align the column at the end of the row.

css.name: .clr-justify-content-start
css.description: Combine with .clr-row to horizontally align columns at the start of the row.

css.name: .clr-justify-content-center
css.description: Combine with .clr-row to horizontally align columns in the center of the row.

css.name: .clr-justify-content-enbd
css.description: Combine with .clr-row to horizontally align columns at the end of the row.

css.name: .clr-justify-content-around
css.description: Combine with .clr-row to horizontally align columns with even space around all columns.

css.name: .clr-justify-content-between
css.description: Combine with .clr-row to horizontally align columns with space between all columns from row start to row end.

bindings.name: clrType
bindings.description: Set the type of button.

bindings.description: Enable or disable the button.

bindings.name: clrWizardButtonHidden
bindings.description: Hide the button from users.

bindings.description: Output that emits when there is a button click event.

bindings.name: id
bindings.description: Set a custom id string for the header action.

bindings.name: title
bindings.description: Set a custom title for the action button.

bindings.name: clrWizardHeaderActionDisabled
bindings.description: Disable the header action button..

bindings.name: actionClicked
bindings.description: Out put that emits the id of the action button clicked.

css.description: Defines the text that is placed into the alert

bindings.name: clrWizardSize
bindings.description: Set the size for the wizard modal.

bindings.name: clrWizardClosable
bindings.description: When true it allows the user to close the wizard.

bindings.name: clrWizardForceForwardNavigation
bindings.description: Reset the pages when navigating backwards when true.

bindings.name: clrWizardOpen
bindings.description: Two way binding for the open state of a wizard.

bindings.name: clrWizardPreventDefaultNext
bindings.description: Prevents user from moving to next page or closing itself. .

bindings.name: clrWizardPreventDefaultCancel
bindings.description: Prevents wizard from closing when cancel/close buttons are activated.

bindings.name: clrWizardPreventNavigation
bindings.description: When true it prevents wizard from any navigation.

bindings.name: clrWizardDisableStepnav
bindings.description: When true it prevents the stepnav buttons from working.

bindings.name: clrWizardOnCancel
bindings.description: Output that emits when wizard is canceled. Combine with clrWizardPreventDefaultCancel to add custom cancel routines for a wizard.

bindings.name: clrWizardOnFinish
bindings.description: Output that emits when wizard finishes. Combint with clrWizardPreventDefaultNext to add custom completion routines.

bindings.name: clrWizardOnReset
bindings.description: Output that emits when wizard resets.

bindings.name: clrWizardCurrentPageChanged
bindings.description: Output that emits when wizard page changes. Use for non-blocking validation. .

bindings.name: clrWizardOnNext
bindings.description: Output that emits when wizard moves to next page. Combine with clrWizardPreventDefaultNext to create custom validation/navigation routines.

bindings.name: clrWizardOnPrevious
bindings.description: Output that emits when wizard moves to previous page.

methods.name: finish

parameters.name: skipChecksAndEmits
parameters.description: When true, do not emit or run checks before closing the wizard.

methods.description: Marks wizard as finished.

methods.name: forceFinish
methods.description: Mark wizard as finished then run checks and emit outputs.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Open the wizard.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Close the wizard

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggle the wizard to the opposite open/closed state.

methods.name: previous
methods.description: Move the wizard to the previous page.

methods.name: next

parameters.name: skipChecksAndEmits
parameters.description: When true, do not emit or run checks before navigating to next page.

methods.description: Navigate wizard to the next page.

methods.name: forceNext
methods.description: Move wizard to the next page without checks or emiting outputs.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancel and close the wizard.

methods.name: checkAndCancel
methods.description: Check for alternate cancel flows on current page and perform cancel if there are none.

methods.name: goTo

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: Identifier of the page to navigate to.

methods.description: Navigate to a specific page.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Reset all wizard pages to incompl= trueete. Navigates wizard to first page.

css.name: .alert-text
css.description: Defines the text that is placed into the alert

bindings.name: clrWizardPageNextDisabled
bindings.description: Two way binding that emits when the next page disabled state is changed.

bindings.name: clrWizardPagePreviousDisabled
bindings.description: Two way binding that emits when the previous page disabled state is changed..

bindings.name: clrWizardPageHasError
bindings.description: True indicates the page (and associated nav button) have error state.

bindings.name: clrWizardPagePreventDefault
bindings.description: Override all actions from the page level. E.g when app needs to use alternative validation.

bindings.name: clrWizardPagePreventDefaultCancel
bindings.description: Override the cancel action at the page level.

bindings.name: clrWizardPagePreventDefaultNext
bindings.description: Override the forward navigation at the page level.

bindings.name: clrWizardPageOnCommit
bindings.description: Output for an event fired when next/finish buttons are clicked.

bindings.name: clrWizardPageOnLoad
bindings.description: Output event emitted when page becomes current page.

bindings.name: clrWizardPageOnCancel
bindings.description: Page level event that emits when wizard is canceled.

bindings.name: clrWizardPageFinish
bindings.description: Output that emits when the page finish button is clicked.

bindings.name: clrWizardPagePrevious
bindings.description: utput that emits an event when the previous button is clicked.

bindings.name: clrWizardPageNext
bindings.description: Output that emits an event when the next button is clicked.

bindings.name: clrWizardPageDanger
bindings.description: Output that emits an event when the danger button is clicked.

bindings.name: clrWizardPagePrimary
bindings.description: Output that emits an event when the next, finsih or danger buttons are clicked.

bindings.name: clrWizardPageCustomButton
bindings.description: Output that emits an event when a custom button is clicked.

bindings.name: id
bindings.description: Set a custom id for a wizard page.

methods.name: readyToComplete
methods.description: A check to see if the next page is disabled

methods.name: completed
methods.description: A getter to check to see if the page is completed

methods.name: completed
methods.description: Set the page completed state to true/false

methods.name: current
methods.description: A check to see if this is the current page active in the wizard.

methods.name: disabled
methods.description: A check to see if this page is disabled

methods.name: enabled
methods.description: A check to see if the page is current, completed and that the previous step was completed.

methods.name: makeCurrent
methods.description: Makes the page instance the current page in the wizard.

css.name: .alert-text
css.description: Defines the text that is placed into the alert

bindings.name: page
bindings.description: Set the page to associate with the nav item..
